title: Singapore noodles
description: Here’s our version of the classic dish, using marinated pork fillet and prawns.
ingredients: 300g/10oz pork tenderloin, trimmed of fat and sinew
½ tsp Chinese five spice powder
1 red onion, cut into thin wedges
20g/¾oz fresh root ginger, peeled and finely grated
10 spring onions, trimmed and sliced diagonally
